title: Wild Mare and Foal on Sandy Dunes
description: A wild pinto horse stands protectively over its young foal resting on the sandy dunes, surrounded by lush green vegetation.

title: Galloping Wild Horses in Assateague
description: A group of wild horses, including a chestnut horse, a pinto horse, and a young foal, gallop through a mix of grassy and sandy terrain, embodying the spirit of freedom in nature.

title: Osprey in Flight with Caught Fish
description: An osprey soars through the bright blue sky, its wings fully extended while clutching a freshly caught fish in its talons, showcasing the power and precision of this bird of prey.

title: Reclining Goat
description: A goat I found relaxing on the slopes of the Lauterbrunnen Valley.

title: Relaxing Cat
description: A peacefully resting cat I stumbled upon outside a church on an island in Stein am Rhein.

title: Monkey Caught in a Rainstorm
description: An Ecuadorian Monkey suddenly finding themselves stuck in a rainstorm.

title: Swimming Galapagos Penguin
description: The only penguin found north of the equator, we caught this playful penguin swimming around us.

title: Galapagos Land Iguana Resting in the Rain
description: A galapagos land iguana resting in the rain.

title: Sleepy Seal
description: A seal that was sound asleep moves to adjust itself.

title: Chatting Birds
description: Two swallow-tailed gulls deep in conversation.

title: Flying Albatross
description: An albatross returning from a long flight to nest on the Galapagos Islands.

title: Lynx in Swedish Woods
description: A Lynx spotted in the woods outside Stockholm.

title: Newborn Blue Footed Booby
description: While observing the mother sitting in her nest, she adjusted herself just enough to let me capture the chick that had just hatched.

title: Giant Tortoise
description: A giant tortoise nibbling on leaves in the woods.

title: Sally Lightfoot Crab
description: A colorful sally lightfoot crab nicely contrasted against the black volcanic rocks.

title: Hohensalzburg Fortress
description: The Hohensalzburg Fortress peeking through the trees.

title: Above Salzburg's Old Town

title: From Salzburg to the Alps
description: Salzburg's Old Town with the Austrian Alps in the distance.

title: Salzburg Sunset
description: A sunset over Salzburg as we descend down the stairs.

title: Hellbrunn Castle Statue
description: Hellbrunn Castle is known for its trick fountains.

title: Redbull Flying Bulls over Spielberg
description: The Redbull Flying Bulls performing over the crowd at Formula 1 Austrian Grand Prix.

title: 2023 Austrian Grand Prix Race Start
description: The grid shortly after race start and heading into turn 2.

title: Hohensalzburg Fortress at Sunset
description: The sun setting behind the Hohensalzburg Fortress.

title: Couple Walking Towards Fortress
description: A couple heading up to the fortress as storm clouds roll in.

title: Wolfgangsee Shoreline
description: The shoreline of Wolfgangsee as a ferry comes in to dock.

title: Looking Out the Schafbergbahn Window
description: The Schafbergbahn is the steepest cog railway in Austria and takes you up to the top of the Schafsberg Mountain.

title: Schafberg Mountain Fog
description: At the top of the Schafberg, there was an extremely thick fog that was blocked by the mountain ridge.

title: Schafberg Mountain Top
description: The view from the top of Schafberg Mountain once the fog had cleared.

title: Hiking Down Schafberg Mountain
description: Hiking down Schafberg Mountain, taking in the view of the Austrian Alps and Wolfgangsee

title: The Schafbergbahn
description: The Schafbergbahn is the steepest cog railway in Austria and takes you up to the top of the Schafsberg Mountain.

title: Hallstatt Austria
description: Looking out over a lake towards the small town of Hallstat.

title: Blue Angels
description: The Blue Angels flying in formation.

title: HALL Wines - Vineyard
description: Looking out over the grapevines at HALL Wines.

title: HALL Wines - Rabbit
description: The Rabbit statue at HALL Wines dancing through the vines.

title: Hot Air Balloon in Napa Valley
description: A hot air balloon landing in Napa Valley.

description: Sunset over the Pacific Coast Highway.

description: Seals arguing on the beach.

description: A seal perched atop a rugged coastline getting splashed by the oncoming waves.

title: Blue Footed Boobys in the Mist
